title: Got bricked Pixel and Pixel XL running Android Q Beta 4
content:
Hello! I have two original pixel phones. They both were on Android Q b4 and they went bricked tomorrow night :( 
The fist one has a bootloop. I can got to fastboot but can not flash it with factory image because bootloader wasn't unlocked also I can not got to recovery mode (it just reboots all the time).
The second one is completely dead :( I can not turn it on. I got only short vibration and nothing happens. In windows device manager it detects as Qualcomm 9008. I haven't found any repair solution over the Internet. Maybe there are some software which can repair my phones? 
I live in Ukraine and as I see there are no official service centers for RMA or something :(
How can I get my phones to work?
Thank you!
